techmeme.title: Gemini 2.0 Flash LLM early impressions: spatial reasoning performance is impressive and its new streaming API is one of those "we live in the future" moments (Simon Willison/Simon Willison's Weblog)
Study: the US is on track to add more construction for computer and electronics manufacturing in 2024 alone than it did during the 20 years before the CHIPS Act (Michael Acton/Financial Times)
The US CSRB starts probing the Salt Typhoon hack; CISA says the CSRB's report could come as early as next spring and wouldn't be disrupted by the transition (Jake Bleiberg/Bloomberg)
Report: Apple canceled the development of a high-performance Mac chip this past summer to let some of its engineers in Israel work on its first AI server chip (John Gruber/Daring Fireball)

Microsoft says Russia-backed hacking group Secret Blizzard targeted Ukraine's military using other cybercriminals' tools, in order to make attribution harder (Lorenzo Franceschi-Bicchierai/TechCrunch)
